Download CBFS

  • MacOS X
  • Windows (32-bit) (or 64-bit)
  • Linux (64-bit)
  • Linux (32-bit)
  • Linux (arm) (or arm5)
  • FreeBSD (64-bit)

Usage

Make some space, find a couchbase server. Point an instance to it. Enjoy. 

      mkdir /tmp/cbfs
      ./cbfs -bucket=cbfs -couchbase=http://mango.hq.northscale.net:8091/ \
          -root=/tmp/cbfs -cachePercent=10 -nodeID=YOURNAMEHERE3

Client

If you want to do cool client stuff, you'll need cbfsclient.

  • MacOS X
  • Windows (32-bit) (or 64-bit)
  • Linux (64-bit)
  • Linux (32-bit)
  • Linux (arm) (or arm5)
  • FreeBSD (64-bit)

Admin Tool

General server parameters and maintenance tasks may be performed with cbfsadm.

  • MacOS X
  • Windows (32-bit) (or 64-bit)
  • Linux (64-bit)
  • Linux (32-bit)
  • Linux (arm) (or arm5)
  • FreeBSD (64-bit)
